rat.name: Rat
rat.description: Ah yes, this rat is made out of rat.

bat.name: Batterfly
bat.description: A bat that is also a butterfly, what a strange creature.

crab.name: Crab
crab.description: I wonder if I can eat this.

wizard.name: Wizard
wizard.description: Why does every MMORPG have one of these things?

goblin.name: Goblin
goblin.description: Didn't I see this same style of goblin in RuneScape?

skeleton.name: Spooky Skeleton
skeleton.description: I wonder if this skeleton is made out of bones.

ogre.name: Ogre
ogre.description: I really feel like the developers had to include generic fantasy creatures.

skeleton2.name: Scary Skeleton
skeleton2.description: Ah yes, it's not spooky, this one is scary.

snek.name: Snek
snek.description: Snek, where you going? Snek, stahp!

spectre.name: Spectre
spectre.description: Has a scythe and looks like it's floating.

lavaslime.name: Lava Slime
lavaslime.description: A cute little slime made out of molten rock.

eye.name: Eye
description: Must have really poor depth perception when you think about it.
Eye really can't seem to figure out how that thing works.

deathknight.name: Death Knight
deathknight.description: Seriously, who comes up with the names for these things?

adherer.name: Dark Mage
adherer.description: I heard that these things drop roses that I can then use to hit things with.

regionhenchman.name: Dark Region Henchman
regionhenchman.description: I heard that these things drop roses that I can then use to hit things with.

angel.name: Angel
angel.description: Holy moly, this is nothing like how they're described in the bible.

ant.name: Worker Ant
ant.description: A hardworking small itty bitty ant!

beetle.name: Beetle
beetle.description: Ever heard of a Dung Beetle, well I'm better!

card.name: Poker Card
card.description: What's it gonna do, gamble me to death?

card2.name: Another Card
card2.description: Okay but like, how does this even make sense as a mob?

rooster.name: Angry Rooster
rooster.description: It's a sleeping rooster that attacks you...

greenpirateskeleton.name: Green Pirate Skeleton
greenpirateskeleton.description: Isn't this just a skeleton but wearing a pirate hat?

blackpirateskeleton.name: Blue Pirate Skeleton
blackpirateskeleton.description: Isn't this just a skeleton but wearing a pirate hat?

blackwizard.name: Dark Wizard
blackwizard.description: They don't look all that different from the other ones.

icewizard.name: Ice Wizard
icewizard.description: It's like similar to some other type of wizard I've encountered before.

babyspider.name: Baby Spooder
babyspider.description: It's cute now but give it a while...

poisonspider.name: Poison Spooder
poisonspider.description: I swear this thing is gonna poison me as soon as I engage it.

firespider.name: Fire Spooder
firespider.description: Damn, that is one hot spider.

blazespider.name: Blaze Spooder
blazespider.description: I wonder how high this spider is...

hellspider.name: Hell Spooder
hellspider.description: Aren't all spiders technically from hell?

cactus.name: Cactus
cactus.description: So it's like, a cactus, that can move?

clam.name: Clam
clam.description: Now this would make a good stew!

crystalscorpion.name: Crystal Scorpion
crystalscorpion.description: It's a scorpion that is made out of crystal, that's really original.

darkogre.name: Dark Ogre
darkogre.description: It didn't get to see much sun...

earthworm.name: Earth Worm
earthworm.description: You know, it would make sense that earth worms are underground.

frog.name: Frog
frog.description: Just look at it hop around and things and stuff.

icevulture.name: Ice Vulture
icevulture.description: It's like a frozen version of the vicious bird I've seen before.

miniiceknight1.name: Mini Ice Knight
miniiceknight1.description: It's a little teeny tiny knight in a little teeny tiny suit of armor.

miniiceknight2.name: Mini Ice Knight
miniiceknight2.description: It's a little teeny tiny knight in a little teeny tiny suit of armor.

miniiceknight3.name: Mini Ice Knight
miniiceknight3.description: It's a little teeny tiny knight in a little teeny tiny suit of armor.

miniiceknight4.name: Mini Ice Knight
miniiceknight4.description: It's a little teeny tiny knight in a little teeny tiny suit of armor.

miniiceknight5.name: Mini Ice Knight
miniiceknight5.description: It's a little teeny tiny knight in a little teeny tiny suit of armor.

miniknight1.name: Mini Knight
miniknight1.description: A little ferocious tiny knight that might actually hurt me.

miniknight2.name: Mini Knight
miniknight2.description: A little ferocious tiny knight that might actually hurt me.

miniknight3.name: Mini Knight
miniknight3.description: A little ferocious tiny knight that might actually hurt me.

miniknight4.name: Mini Knight
miniknight4.description: A little ferocious tiny knight that might actually hurt me.

miniknight5.name: Mini Knight
miniknight5.description: A little ferocious tiny knight that might actually hurt me.

miniknight6.name: Mini Knight
miniknight6.description: A little ferocious tiny knight that might actually hurt me.

miniemperor.name: Mini Emperor
miniemperor.description: It looks like the leader of this band of mini knights.

oldogre.name: Old Ogre
oldogre.description: He's old, and balding, but still dangerous.

pinkelf.name: Pink Elf
pinkelf.description: A pink elf, it's pink, what else do you want to know.

redelf.name: Red Elf
redelf.description: It's an elf, and it is red, kinda looks like the developer ran out of assets.

skyelf.name: Sky Elf
skyelf.description: An elf that lives in the sky... What is it doing here?

slime.name: Slime
slime.description: Why does every game have a slime in it?

snowelf.name: Snow Elf
snowelf.description: A magical tiny elf from the snow realm.

snowman.name: Snowman
snowman.description: A magical snowman from the snow realm.

snowman2.name: Snowman
snowman2.description: I wonder if it'll be resilient to fire.

rabbitman.name: The Rabbit Man
rabbitman.description: A dude... dressed as a rabbit... why?

snowwolf.name: Snow Wolf
snowwolf.description: I really expected the wolf to be made out of snow :(

skeletonking.name: Skeleton King
skeletonking.description: Here he is, the chad of r/neverbrokeabone.

ogrelord.name: Ogre Lord
ogrelord.description: I better keep a distance before this thing turns me into a stew!

hellhound.name: Hellhound
hellhound.description: I better keep a distance before this thing turns me into a stew!

miniseadragon.name: Mini Sea Dragon
miniseadragon.description: Aww it's a little version of something that's gonna stomp me later!
